description:
The return of Kaede and Susano-oh cause confusion while new Aragami begin to pollute Nara with pollen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Chase Down Yamato Highway! Love Under Fire!!!
Oimasu! Yamatoro! Koi no Midare Uchi!!
Poursuite sur la route de Yamato ! L`amour sous le feu !
追います! 大和路! 恋の乱れ撃ち!!
